        <script><![CDATA[// Show a warning if ACL has snc_internal and some other role, except for snc_external-containing
// Also, show a warning if ACL has only snc_external-containing role, but not snc_internal
var SYS_ID_INTERNAL= '7fcaa702933002009c8579b4f47ffbde';
var aclSysId = current.sys_id;

// 1. show a warmning if ACL has snc_internal and some other role, except for snc_external-containing
var grAclRoles = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl_role');
grAclRoles.addQuery('sys_security_acl', aclSysId);
grAclRoles.addQuery('sys_user_role', SYS_ID_INTERNAL);
grAclRoles.query();
if (grAclRoles.hasNext()) {
	var rolesContainingExternalAndInternal = _getRolesContainingExternal();
	rolesContainingExternalAndInternal += SYS_ID_INTERNAL;
	var grAclRoles2 = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl_role');
	grAclRoles2.addQuery('sys_security_acl', aclSysId);
	grAclRoles2.addQuery('sys_user_role', 'NOT IN', rolesContainingExternalAndInternal);
	grAclRoles2.query();
	if (grAclRoles2.hasNext())
		gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('Warning: The ACL has snc_internal role, but other roles are present, too.'));
}

// 2. show message that snc_external-containing is present, but not snc_internal
grAclRoles = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl_role');
grAclRoles.addQuery('sys_security_acl', aclSysId);
grAclRoles.addQuery('sys_user_role', 'IN', _getRolesContainingExternal());
grAclRoles.query();
if (grAclRoles.hasNext()) {
	var grAclRoles2 = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl_role');
	grAclRoles2.addQuery('sys_security_acl', aclSysId);
	grAclRoles2.addQuery('sys_user_role',SYS_ID_INTERNAL);
	grAclRoles2.query();
	if (!grAclRoles2.hasNext())
		gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('Info: The ACL has snc_external containing role, but not snc_internal: check if it might be needed.'));
}

// find roles, containing snc_external, including self
function _getRolesContainingExternal() {
	var SYS_ID_EXTERNAL = '940ba702933002009c8579b4f47ffbe2';
	var result = '';
	var api = new SNC.RoleManagementAPI();
	var rolesContainingExternal = api.findAllContainingRolesForRole(SYS_ID_EXTERNAL);
	gs.print(rolesContainingExternal);
	var it = rolesContainingExternal.iterator();
	while (it.hasNext())
		result += '' + it.next() + ',';

	return result;
}
]]></script>
